ESPublicQuery.SQL: SELECT ESFISalesPerson.GID AS GID, ESFISalesPerson.Code AS Code, ESFISalesPerson.Name AS Name, FK_ESGOUser_ESFISalesPerson.UserID AS UserID, ESFISalesPerson.fCompanyCode AS fCompanyCode FROM ESFISalesPerson AS ESFISalesPerson INNER JOIN ESGOUser AS FK_ESGOUser_ESFISalesPerson ON ESFISalesPerson.fPersonCodeGID = FK_ESGOUser_ESFISalesPerson.fPersonLinkGID WHERE (ESFISalesPerson.fCompanyCode = ##(ESCOMPANY)) AND (FK_ESGOUser_ESFISalesPerson.UserID = ##(ESUSER))
